summary: AT ABOUT 80K MILES THE PASSENGER AIRBAG OCCUPIED LIGHT WOULD ALTERNATE BETWEEN ON AND OFF WHILE DRIVING.  AT ABOUT 93K MILES THE SERVICE AIRBAG LIGHT COMES ON AND THE SERVICE AIRBAG MESSAGE ON THE INFORMATION CENTER IS ON.  RESET THE MESSAGE AND THE RED SERVICE AIRBAG LIGHT REMAINS "ON".  THE PASSENGER SEAT OCCUPIED LIGHT  INDICATES "OFF".
